pageContent.title2: Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Understanding the Context for the Solution and Maximizing Value
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">What do you ask Dr. Cardonza at this point?</welcomeText>

choice.choiceText: A. How do you see currently available therapies and treatments fitting into how you treat your patients with hyponatremia in heart failure?
B. You’ve talked about a number of initiatives, some of which will take time. What is your timeline for expanding into these areas?
C. We have talked about the goals of your department. How have they changed from last year?

D. It sounds like your department is focused on two main objectives – achieving your patient treatment goals and maintaining your status as a top hospital. Both are big goals; do you anticipate any challenges from focusing on both at the same time?
